text:
Five, four, three, two, one. Ok, coming! Where
is Maggie? Where is she?

Where is Maggie? Oh, hello, boys and girls.
Hi. I am playing hide and seek with Maggie.

Maggie: Hello!
So, where is Maggie? Can you see her? I can´t.

Where is she? I don´t know where Maggie is.
Oh, hey, look! It´s Maggie´s head. Maggie´s

head. Haha! I can see Maggie´s head. Maggie!
I found you. Come out!

Great! Well, I saw Maggie´s head.
Maggie: OK! Ok!

Can you touch your head? Touch your head.
Yeah. So, what is it? It´s a head. Say with

me. It´s a head. It´s a head. It´s a head.
Again. It´s a head. It´s a head. It´s a

head. And again. It´s a head. It´s a head.
It´s a head.

Maggie: It´s a head!
Yeah. This is my head.

Maggie: Hi.
Oh, here is Maggie.

Maggie: Yeah!
Great. So, Maggie. It´s my turn to hide and

it´s your turn to seek.
Maggie: Ok.

So start counting. Right. See you. Ok, my
turn to hide.

Maggie: One, two, three, four, five, six,
seven, eight, nine, ten. Coming!

Hello. Can you help me find Steve? Where is
he? Can you see Steve? Look! It´s Steve´s

bottom.
Can you see Steve´s bottom? Steve! Found

you! I can see your bottom.
What? My bottom?

Maggie: Look, Steve´s bottom!
Oh no! Maggie could see my bottom.

Maggie: Yeah!
Say with me. It´s a bottom. It´s a bottom.

It´s a bottom.
Maggie: Yeah!

Come on. It´s a bottom. It´s a bottom. It´s
a bottom. And again. It´s a bottom. It´s

a bottom. It´s a bottom. Oh dear.
Maggie: It´s a bottom. It´s a bottom. It´s

a bottom.
Ok, Maggie. My turn to count and your turn

to hide.
Maggie: Yeah!

So off you go.
Maggie: Ok!

Here we go again!
Maggie: Yeah!

One, two, miss a few… ninety-nine, one hundred.
Maggie: Time to hide. Time to hide.

Coming. Ready or not. Ok, where is Maggie?
Can you see her? Where is she?

I can see Maggie. Look! Can you see her? Look!
I can see Maggie´s tummy. Look! It´s Maggie´s

tummy. Can you see it? Come on, look! Look!
Can you see Maggie´s tummy now?

Yeah. Come out, Maggie! We found you!
Maggie: Oh dear. Ok.

We saw Maggie´s tummy, didn´t we? Yeah!
So pat your tummy. Pat your tummy and say

with me. It´s a tummy. It´s a tummy. It´s
a tummy. And again. It´s a tummy. It´s a

tummy. It´s a tummy. One more time.
Both: It´s a tummy. It´s a tummy. It´s
